com.twitter.sdk.android.core

Class TwitterApiClient

  • Object
    • com.twitter.sdk.android.core.TwitterApiClient

  • public class TwitterApiClient
extends Object
    A class to allow authenticated access to Twitter API endpoints. Can be extended to provided additional endpoints by extending and providing Retrofit API interfaces to getService(Class)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TwitterApiClient(Session session)
      Must be instantiated after TwitterCore has been initialized via Fabric.with(android.content.Context, io.fabric.sdk.android.Kit[]).

    • Constructor Detail

      • TwitterApiClient

        public TwitterApiClient(Session session)
        Must be instantiated after TwitterCore has been initialized via Fabric.with(android.content.Context, io.fabric.sdk.android.Kit[]).
        Parameters:
        session - Session to be used to create the API calls.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if TwitterSession argument is null
